General.Name: Grupo Profuturo S.A.B. de C.V
General.Description: Grupo Profuturo, S.A.B. de C.V. manages the retirement funds of workers affiliated to the IMSS and ISSSTE in Mexico. It also offers loans to Profuturo pensioners and IMSS pensioners, as well as to Grupo Bal employees through payroll discounts; and advisory services to manage pension. The company is based in Mexico City, Mexico.
General.Address: Boulevard Adolfo LA3pez Mateos No. 2009, Mexico City, DF, Mexico, 01010
